name: Pitcher Perfect
description:
Play as a sentient beer pitcher, serving an endless stream of guests in an attempt to get a highscore.

See the in-game tutorial for instructions on how to play.

Made with Godot, GIMP and Renoise for Mini Jam 84: Bubbles

Known bugs: doesn't load in Firefox, but works just fine on Chrome and Edge. Sorry!

Known bugs: it's possible to get knocked offscreen and be unable to move - please reload the page if this happens. Sorry about this one, didn't catch it during playtesting. Leaving the game as is during rating, but may fix after
